QuestData.Title: Just a Little Touched
QuestData.Description: I like to check in on Augustus in Terrordale every once in a while, just to make sure he's alright. Some of us undead cope with the plague better than others, I suppose.$b$bTerrordale is west of here. Would you mind checking in on him for me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Augustus the Touched in Terrordale.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Augustus the Touched at Terrordale in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: You've come to the right place, $g mister: lady;! No place better than Terrordale, yes siree, that's right! The jewel of Lordaeron!
